function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High density of people in buildings leading to elevated risk of prolonged self-isolation and mental health issues","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased urbanization despite the advice to expand horizontally and decrease densities may lead to higher risk of disease spread in crowded areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on walkable and cyclable urban environments may lead to continued reliance on cars, increasing pollution and health risks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate planning for emergency facility requirements and medical infrastructure may result in insufficient response to future outbreaks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental impact of disease mitigation measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact on comfort of people spending most of their time at home","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deposition of virus on surfaces after contact with infected person or via turbulent flow","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forced confinement at home leading to increased risk of viral spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Closure of public spaces and suspension of activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zoonotic disease outbreaks from animal origins","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Link between zoonotic diseases and climate change & land usage","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of human, domestic, and wild animal habitats leading to virus mixing and propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown measures confining people to their houses for long periods of time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of green building certification systems covering pandemic-resilient indicators","category":"Health and Safety risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for pandemic-resilient residential buildings","category":"Health and Safety risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of local services and amenities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on external food supply","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases in high-density areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low room to member ratio","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate noise insulation and acoustics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited availability of self-dependent services","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of reliable and constant ict connection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inflexible indoor space during quarantine","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate personal space for family members","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of rainwater storage and filtration may lead to the spread of waterborne diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of measurement for water usage reduction may lead to inaccurate assessment of water-saving efficiency.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on online systems without proper infrastructure may lead to accessibility and connectivity issues during a pandemic.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper management of medical waste potentially infected with contagious diseases during pandemics.","category":"Health and Safety risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased and ongoing energy consumption in residential buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased consumption of nonrenewable energy","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of energy-inefficient appliances","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for virus transmission in shared toilets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher risk of virus transmission through greywater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption due to lockdown measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination of building water systems by pathogens","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of measures to limit virus propagation in household wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high co2 levels","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe drinking water due to contamination","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of outdoor environmental conditions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring air quality parameters at infrequent intervals","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate control of airflows in micro spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate natural ventilation levels","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air filtration systems for pathogen propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of indoor air pollution monitoring and control","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Main transmission route of the sars-cov-2 is via droplets carried via the air","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown hindering the ability to perform physical activity","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper maintenance of green spaces leading to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation of water features leading to the spread of water-borne diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate access to outdoor spaces leading to mental health issues during quarantine","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
